"who, exactly, is supposed to read this book?"
Nobody, it's all in service of Dorkins arrogant egoism.

The funny thing Boolavogue is that by releasing this epub you are only making sure more people read his book and as a side effect go to his website. He already has his money and isn't going to hurt any bit by releasing this. Thanks though for helping to promote him. LOL.
Cool. I've already got the hardback but its too heavy to carry to work. This is perfect. Now I need to figure out how to get it onto by ipod touch....
First, thanks for the upload. A big thanks too to seeders. Thank you too mr. dawkins.
